objects.text:
• Bohemian-inspired design
• Premium leather construction
• Comfortable padded insole
• Hand-detailed ornaments

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish and modern layout to promote footwear, specifically artisan-inspired sneakers. It is divided into quadrants with alternating warm-toned backgrounds. The top-left contains the prominent heading layers `"heading_1"` and `"heading_2"` in a bold, white sans-serif font. Below this, a slender and minimalist `"subheading"` adds a premium feel. The bottom-left quadrant presents a bulleted feature list under `"description"`, accompanied by a bold price under `"price"`. A solid rounded rectangular call-to-action button `"cta_button"` with the `"cta"` text encourages purchase. The right side highlights the `"product_image"` of a boho-style sneaker, centered against layered angular patterns and circular accents.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Beige (#F5F1E6)
- Burnt Sienna (#C78C60)
- Pale Sand (#E8D2B4)
- Deep Brown (#754C29)
- Soft Cocoa (#9D6B53)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a creative blend of warm and earthy tones, giving the shoe a handcrafted, artisanal look. Dominant colors include shades of caramel (#D59F6C), terracotta (#C75C2E), cream beige (#F6E2BA), and burnt orange (#A6471D). These colors are carefully layered and blended to create depth, with darker outlines and stitching highlighting key details. The color transitions feel organic, enhanced by leather-like textures and artistic patterns. The shoe lace contrasts slightly in a deep rust color, adding vibrancy to the composition. For an advertisement banner, this palette offers a grounded and inviting aesthetic ideal for lifestyle or artisanal branding themes.
